titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to remove in-person requirements under Medicare for mental health services furnished through telehealth and telecommunications technology.
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to remove in-person requirements under Medicare for mental health services furnished through telehealth and telecommunications technology.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: This bill permanently removes in-person evaluation requirements for mental health telehealth services under Medicare.
